name: Axe Strike
description: Swing a heavy axe at the enemy.

name: Club Attack
description: Blunt force attack with wooden weapon.

name: Shadow Grasp
description: Dark tendrils from the shadows attack.

name: Chilling Touch
description: Freezing cold that damages both body and mind.

name: Chilling Touch
description: Freezing cold that damages both body and mind.

name: Shadow Tendril
description: Dark tendrils from the shadows that constrict the target.

name: Ethereal Scream
description: A piercing wail that damages both body and mind.

name: Shadow Strangulation
description: A suffocating shadow that drains sanity and health.

name: Claws of Night
description: Multiple shadowy strikes that wear down defenses.

name: Frostbite Strike
description: A freezing attack that temporarily paralyzes.

name: Glacial Armor
description: A protective ice barrier that absorbs damage.

name: Ice Axe Smash
description: A powerful ice weapon strike that freezes the target.

name: Frost Aura
description: A chilling field that reduces health.

name: Rock Toss
description: Massive boulder hurled at the enemy.

name: Shadow Tentacles
description: Dark tendrils that grasp the player, draining health and sanity.

name: Soul Siphon
description: Drains life force from the target.

name: Phantasmal Horror
description: Summons terrifying illusions that reduce sanity.
